author: CandleSmartHome.com
description: The main theme for the Candle smart home
name: Candle Theme

Background color.description: You can override the default background colors with your own. Since the text color remains white, it's recommended to choose a darker color. It must be provided as a 'hex value', or a standard HTML color name. For example: #641364 is a deep purple. Using 'black' will make it black. Set is to empty to use the defaults.

Hide floorplan.description: If you nevery use it, then you might want to hide the floorplan.

Debugging.description: Advanced. Debugging allows you to diagnose any issues with the add-on. If enabled it will result in a lot more debug data in the internal log (which can be found under settings -> developer -> view internal logs).
